entry.title: Vite report on Sat, 26 Aug 2023 20:02:24
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Researchers at Tencent AI Lab Introduces IP-Adapter: A Text-Compatible Image Prompt Adapter for Text-to-Image Diffusion Models
- Ngrok Starts Offering One Static Domain to All of its Free Users
- From Data to Frame: The Evolution of PDUs Across the OSI Model
- Overcoming Terraform Deployment Challenges: How to fix authorization issues using Service Principal on Azure Cloud

Business:
- High-income Americans rarely mix with poorer people. Restaurants like Applebee's and Olive Garden are the exception.
- I spent most of my life without a penny in savings, but learning how much I can earn with high-yield savings completely changed my approach
- I'll make $140K driving for UPS this year. We deserve this pay — it's not an easy job.
- Apple, Microsoft, Tesla, and Meta see a combined $625 billion wipeout in market value amid August's stock slump
- Startup extinction season is going to kick into high gear — and there's likely going to be a bloodbath soon for some of the 50,000 VC-backed startups
- Wiley embraces a flexible future, empowering employees along the ... - HR Dive
- Merch, vinyl, hotels and credit cards: Taylor Swift's Eras Tour helped a bunch of companies – but hurt others
- China's richest people are leaning hard into quiet luxury, wielding stealth wealth like a weapon and scorning their flashy, label-chasing peers
- 'Barbie' is about to pass 'Super Mario Bros.' and become the world's biggest movie of 2023
- 66% of Americans say they want extended European-style vacation policies at work
- Uncle Sam accuses SpaceX of not considering asylees and refugees for employment

AI:
- This AI Research from MIT Demonstrates How Machine-Learning System Based on Light Could Yield More Powerful and Efficient Large Language Models
- Stephen King won't forbid AI from training on his writing, and he's not afraid of AI ... yet

Others:
- 200 monster hunters armed with drones join the biggest search in 50 years for Scotland's fabled Loch Ness creature
- The pedestrian detection systems in self-driving cars are less likely to detect children and people of color, study suggests
- Stormy Daniels leads mocking and disbelief that Trump weighs just '215 pounds,' as his Fulton County Jail booking record says
- I work as a fire lookout, living in a remote cabin with no plumbing or electricity. Here's why I want to be here as long as there are humans doing this job.
- Extreme heat could make photosynthesis impossible for tropical trees and plants that may all die as a result, a new study found.
- Apple Watch Is A Health Marvel, But Maybe A Health Hazard, Too, Report Claims
- Where to watch USA vs. New Zealand live stream basketball for free in FIBA World Cup
- Images from the Solar Orbiter spacecraft reveal tiny flares shooting from a 'hole' in the sun. They could explain how the sun blasts Earth with charged particles.
- 'Putin's vulture': Why the Ka-52 attack helicopter is one of Russia's most influential weapon systems
- Take a look at the $63 million F-16 fighter jet the West has pledged to help Ukraine win the war with Russia
